if __name__ == '__main__':

#-----Solution-----

def main():
    n = int(input()) # number of elements
    a = list(map(int, input().split())) # list A
    b = list(map(int, input().split())) # list B
    c = [] # list C
    for i in range(n): # append list C with sum of A and B
        c.append(a[i]+b[i]) 

    c.sort() # sort list C
    l = [] # list L
    for i in range(n): # append list L with modulus of C and n
        l.append(c[i]%n) 

    print(*l)

main()

def main():
    print("hello world")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = []
for i in range(n):
    c.append((a[i]+b[i])%n)

c2 = sorted(c)

for i in range(n):
    b[c.index(c2[i])] = i

print(" ".join(map(str, b)))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = [(x + y) % n for (x, y) in zip(a, b)]
    c.sort()
    print(' '.join([str(x) for x in c]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = [a[i]+b[i] for i in range(n)]

    c.sort()
    l = [c[i] % n for i in range(n)]

    print(*l)

main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = [((x + y) % n) for (x, y) in zip(a, b)]
    c.sort()
    print(' '.join([str(x) for x in c]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
